cards.title: Kiwi Leave
cards.text: Next person to leave the room has to down their drink

cards.text: Everyone that has had their heart broken has to drink

cards.text: If %SELF% likes monkeys, they choose someone that needs to drink, otherwise they need to drink

cards.title: Chris
cards.text: %SELF% and %PLAYER1% have to come up with an obscure fact, The person with the least obscure facts has to drink
